item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:3 Chances: Hydrogen and fuel cell technology has the potential to play a crucial role in lowering emissions and providing alternative energy solutions. Sustainable transport stocks have reached new heights, making them prime investment opportunities for the future. Electric vehicle (EV) sales are skyrocketing, with projections showing a strong increase in global EV sales by 2026.
